name: A Miracle Will Not Occur
description:
UMINEKO AND HIGURASHI SPOILERS

This fangame took part in the Games of the Golden Witch jam.

Bernkastel, the Witch of Miracles who has lived for a thousand years, has challanged you to battle her to the best of three so she can ease her boredom...

Fight the witch in three different fragments, an RPG themed fragment, a danmaku (bullet hell) themed fragment and a platformer themed fragment.
